welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mickleover, UK! Prepare to be enchanted by the charm of our historic city, known for its beautiful architecture and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mickleover has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'EMA Free WiFi'.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Nottingham Airport is reserved for VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
